section.title: GetDatastoreList
section.para: GetDatastoreList returns all datastores for a management system as list objects.

listitem.para: Output: DatastoreList as an array. List object contains name and ID properties.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate GetDatastoreList usage:

example.title: GetDatastoreList WSDL
example.programlisting:
<message name="GetDatastoreList"> <part name="emsGuid" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="GetDatastoreListResponse"> <part name="return" type="typens:VmdbwsSupport..DatastoreListArray"/> </message>
<xsd:complexType name="VmdbwsSupport..DatastoreList"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType>

example.title: GetDatastoreList Output (Windows PowerShell)
example.screen:
Datastores:
id name -- ---- 8 StarM1-Test2 7 StarM1-TestProd 6 StarM1-Dev 5 StarM2-Test 4 StarM1-vCloud_Test 3 StarM1-Test 2 local-dev 1 Thecus-N7700
